mapper.select: select ad.no no, res.resname resname, ad.userid userid, mem.tel tel, ad.bannerimg bannerimg, date_format(ad.startdate,'%Y-%m-%d') startdate, date_format(ad.enddate,'%Y-%m-%d') enddate, ad.writedate writedate, ad.status status from ad_table as ad join restaurant_table as res on ad.resno = res.resno join member_table as mem on ad.userid = mem.userid order by ad.no desc
mapper.update: update ad_table set status=#{status} where no=#{no}
